nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                + " Quarkus currently offers a stable support of GraalVM 19.3.1 and 20.0.0."
          
          
            
                                + " Quarkus currently supports GraalVM 19.3.1 and 20.0.0."
Please keep the out of date part as that's exactly what we test. People using 20.0.1 won't have this warning for instance.
